sentences.english: The geographical field exercitation is an important part of the geographical teaching process in universities.
sentences.chinese: 地理野外实习是高校地理教学过程中的重要教学环节。

sentences.english: Bring your own drinking water as it is not always available in the field.
sentences.chinese: 应带备足够开水，因为在野外通常都不会有供应。

sentences.english: The results of field test show that a well effect of extinguish fire can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 野外灭火试验表明，该枪灭火效果较好。

sentences.english: Some boy scouts from the city were on a camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 一些城市里来的童子军孩子们在野外露营。

sentences.english: Orang are currently on the verge of extinction wildly.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩现在面临着在野外灭绝的境地。

sentences.english: Moss collections are quite often begun using samples transplanted from the wild in a water-retaining bag.
sentences.chinese: 收集苔藓经常是由野外移植进一个装水的袋子中。

sentences.english: As a kid, he burned off energy outdoors catching snakes and turtles.
sentences.chinese: 孩童时期，他就爱在野外撒欢，抓蛇，捕乌龟。

sentences.english: The system's capability can be expanded to provide up to 30 kilowatts of AC power for use in the field.
sentences.chinese: 在野外，该系统最高可以提供30千瓦交流电源。

sentences.english: A fisherman abandons his big-city life to find himself in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫放弃了大城市来到了野外生活。

sentences.english: Backcountry travel may involve travel over both trails and off-trail areas.
sentences.chinese: 野外行进包括在小径上和小径以外通过。

sentences.english: As geologists, we work in the fied most of the time.
sentences.chinese: 作为地质学家，我们大部分时间在野外工作。

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 独个的山地大猩猩从来不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: Teachers often chaperon their classes on field trips.
sentences.chinese: 在野外郊游时老师常看护着班上的学生。

sentences.english: Regarding the experiment animals, encaged mountain hares caught from wild field were used.
sentences.chinese: 实验用的动物，选择了从野外捕捉不久的雪兔个体。

sentences.english: We met up with friends in a field crowded with other picnickers .
sentences.chinese: 到了野外，野餐者众多，我们还遇到了朋友。

sentences.english: The flagship halal dish from China, hand-pulled noodles hail from the wild, sandy lands of northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 作为清真食品的代表，兰州拉面来自西北多沙的野外。

definition: to forage/to hunt for food/to scavenge/fig. to make a living
to cook a meal over a campfire (usu. for a group of people on an outing)/cookout
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
game/wild animals and birds hunted for food or sport
